Package Files

package Files
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ArithmeticMean
    The class calculates and displays the arithmetic mean of two or more numbers read from a file.
    Exercises
    Contains basic exercises with working with files.
    PigLatin
    The class takes a text from the "in.txt" file and translates the sentences written in Romanian into another language called “pig Latin”.
